scripts.dev: BOOTSTRAP_ENV_DIR=../../confs bun run --cwd tools/configurator src/cli.ts dev --project=converged-portal
scripts.build:mono: BOOTSTRAP_ENV_DIR=../../confs bun run --cwd tools/configurator src/cli.ts build --project=converged-portal --preset=mono --output=../../deployment
scripts.build:micro: BOOTSTRAP_ENV_DIR=../../confs bun run --cwd tools/configurator src/cli.ts build --project=converged-portal --preset=micro --output=../../deployment
scripts.build:scale: BOOTSTRAP_ENV_DIR=../../confs bun run --cwd tools/configurator src/cli.ts build --project=converged-portal --preset=scale --output=../../deployment
scripts.k3s:import: podman save converged-portal:latest -o /tmp/converged-portal.tar && sudo k3s ctr images import /tmp/converged-portal.tar && rm /tmp/converged-portal.tar
